catalog.description: Physical and chemical properties, manipulative skills, isolation and purification, characterization and identification, syntheses.
catalog.note: Students are required to attend both the lecture and the lab, and are discouraged from adding the class after the first lab. Costs for non-returnable materials and breakage will be charged to the student account at the end of the semester.
catalog.prerequisite: CHEM 351M; or CHEM 351; or CHEM 357. Chem 352 or Chem 352M or concurrent enrollment (preferred).
catalog.title: Organic Chemistry Laboratory--Majors.

course_headers.header_text: Students taking CHEM 354 laboratory will be charged for non-returnable materials plus the cost of any breakage. Students are required to attend both the lecture and the lab.
